text: Roshni Walia is an Indian actress. She began her career with television advertisements and made her acting debut with Main Lakshmi Tere Aangan Ki. Walia is best known for her portrayal of Ajabde Punwar in Bharat Ka Veer Putra – Maharana Pratap and Tara Mane in Tara From Satara. == Early life == Roshni Walia was born on 20 September 2001 in Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, India. She currently resides in Mumbai. Her mother is Sweety Walia, and she has an older sister named Noor Walia. Walia's maternal grandfather was an army officer.
